attributes.action: Encourage public to take photographic evidence of drivers using mobile phones
attributes.additional_details:
This could be managed by advertising an email address to report the offence. A photograph of the driver using a mobile device along with the car registration should be sufficient enough for prosecution. 

On a number of occasions I have been left infuriated when passing drivers using their phones. As we all know, all it takes is one mishap to cause a serious accident. 

By calling on the public It could save more lives by putting it in their hands not just the eyes of police forces.
attributes.background: I urge the Government to encourage the public (including passengers of vehicles) to take photograpic evidence of drivers who are using mobile phones.
